name: Aya-haired daughters
description:
A naughty heartwarming heart-full RPG unfolded by the outside of the beast and the beast! Here it is !!

――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――
[Synopsis]
The main character, Meiri, who is about to travel the day before her training, is asked by her mother Yoko to pick herbs in the forest.
Reunited with Harfilia, a beastman's older sister.

Harfilia "Can you help calm the" ancient species "?"

Yoko "Yeah ... Meiri-chan, please help me ♪"
"Please come and see Merin, the fortune teller on Hekopaco Island ♪ Don't forget your training ♪"

The story swells, training Ancient species sedation Meiri who decided to search for humans
Can you finish the three tasks safely !? What is Aya Hair !!?
A two-person trip running around a vast map from west to east !!

Estimated play time 10 to 15 hours
